translation.Imagem de uma logo representando o event: Image of a logo representing the DoWhile 2021 programming event
translation.Ícone representando a bandeira do Brasil: Icon representing the Brazilian flag so that the application language is changed to Portuguese when clicking
translation.Ícone representando a bandeira dos Estad: Icon representing the flag of the United States so that when clicking the application's language can be changed to English
translation.Foto do perfil do Github do usuário que: Github profile photo of the commenting user
translation.Qual sua expectativa para o evento?: What are your expectations for the event?
